quote: Once I accidentally left my passport in Nice, France, when I was on my way to Prague. Upon arriving in Vienna, after taking an overnight, and being asked to present my travel documents and realizing I forgot them at the hotel, they kicked me off the train and sent me back!
author: Megalyn Echikunwoke

quote: Thursday night football is here to stay. So we're looking at ways to make it safer. Now they're playing division games, so you limit travel. Now the question is, should you play Sunday night before a Thursday night?
author: John Madden

quote: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
author: Donny Robinson

quote: Rome - the city of visible history, where the past of a whole hemisphere seems moving in funeral procession with strange ancestral images and trophies gathered from afar.
author: George Eliot

quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.
author: William Blake

quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.
author: Henry Adams

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
author: John Muir

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on its vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to its security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Gymnastics demands so much of our time. We train all week and travel and compete on weekends. The people you're surrounded by really become your second family, your best friends, your sisters. My coach was like a second mother for me.
author: Amanda Borden

quote: Every day is intense and alive, whether it's travel, work, even down time, which there is so little of.
author: Josh Lucas

quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.
author: Damon Albarn

quote: What should I have known or written had I been a quiet, mercantile politician or a lord in waiting? A man must travel, and turmoil, or there is no existence.
author: Lord Byron

quote: My kids started school, so having a strong base in Melbourne has been a key priority. I'm not daunted by the travel. People say, 'It's so far to Australia,' and I say, 'You get on the plane, you eat well, you sleep, you wake up - and you're there.'
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: I hate to travel with stuff.
author: Manolo Blahnik

quote: I'm terrified of bugs and I travel with sprays, lotions, potions; the lot. I have to check the room before I go to sleep and if I come across a bug and fail to remove it I have to sleep in a separate room as I'm paranoid that I'll be taken advantage of as I sleep.
author: Freema Agyeman

quote: I've never done it, but I think if you do a Google search for 'People who will help me travel across the country to meet my online love,' I'm probably the only person that comes up.
author: Nev Schulman

quote: There are two books that I often travel with; one is 'The Theory on Moral Sentiments' by Adam Smith. The other is 'The Meditations.' It's not that I agree with either views expressed in the books, but I believe ideas and thoughts of older generations can offer food for thought for the current generation.
author: Wen Jiabao

quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there.
author: Fred Allen

quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
author: Al Gore

quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
author: Mary Ritter Beard

quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.
author: Philip Glass

quote: There's only one drummer. We all travel to his beat. Well, I couldn't sing his song. Because for me, it wasn't a truthful statement. Well, Linda sang it, and it was a monster for her.
author: Barry McGuire

quote: Although my book is banned I am still allowed to go to China and travel. There is no longer the kind of control that Mao used to have-there have been deep fundamental changes in society.
author: Jung Chang

quote: Once I accidentally left my passport in Nice, France, when I was on my way to Prague. Upon arriving in Vienna, after taking an overnight, and being asked to present my travel documents and realizing I forgot them at the hotel, they kicked me off the train and sent me back!
author: Megalyn Echikunwoke

quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.
author: Philip Glass

author: Barry McGuire

quote: Although my book is banned I am still allowed to go to China and travel. There is no longer the kind of control that Mao used to have-there have been deep fundamental changes in society.
author: Jung Chang

quote: But my sense in talking to people when I travel is that the film business is not that dissimilar from a lot of other businesses.
author: Steven Soderbergh

quote: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: Each day as I travel through downtown Tucson, I am amazed at how quickly the most ancient of human behaviors have changed. For as long as there have been Homo sapiens - roughly 200,000 years - people have filled their lives principally with two activities: talking directly with other people, and doing physical things.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: Tell people you're a Canadian or a Kiwi when you travel and they'll adore you.
author: Daniel Gillies

quote: I actually think some of my best moments in life have been while I was with people from Instagram - whether it's super late nights getting a release out or being able to travel to places I'd never visited and meeting some of the most interesting people I've ever met.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: I travel so much and am always living out of a suitcase, so my favorite saying is 'Wherever you go, there you are'. I love it because it's reassuring to me that you have to live in the moment wherever you happen to be.
author: Jake Shears

quote: As a teenager, I used to travel everywhere with my guitar. I appreciated the fact it was with me, but it was always an absolute pain to carry around - even though, in those days, you could take in on a plane as hand luggage.
author: Greg Wise

quote: There are still many places I haven't seen that I'd like to travel to. I've never seen the Pyramids, and I'd love to explore the culture in North India. I think walking in the Andes would also be awesome.
author: Bjorn Ulvaeus

quote: Finney is about the best writer of time travel stories ever, and I adore time travel stories - have to make a time travel game someday!
author: Warren Spector

quote: I travel the garden of music, thru inspiration. It's a large, very large garden, seen?
author: Peter Tosh

quote: The Lord gave me 'Sojourner,' because I was to travel up an' down the land, showin' the people their sins an' bein' a sign unto them. Afterwards, I told the Lord I wanted another name 'cause everybody else had two names, and the Lord gave me 'Truth,' because I was to declare the truth to people.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another.
author: Roger Moore

quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
author: Mink Stole

quote: I have been able to travel all over the country and see many places that I probably never would have visited. I have also participated in many charity events for worthy causes.
author: Rob Mariano

quote: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: I'm a travel enthusiast.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: I think having toured the world and seeing many places, I've just been blown away by how we've really scarred our home. I'm as guilty as the next person if not more so. I travel a lot. The damage we do to our planet is huge.
author: James Blunt

quote: My pals, such as they are, in Hollywood, ask me why I love to travel to D.C. so much, why it's a vacation destination for me. I say, 'Because I sometimes have perfect days there.'
author: Ben Stein

quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education. In order to appreciate cultures of another nation, one needs to go there, know the people and mingle with the culture of that country. One way to do that, if one is lucky enough, is to buy things from those cultures.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: If I go anywhere, and I don't have my coffee, I don't drink coffee. When I travel, I carry it with me - and I ask hotels to grind it and brew it for me if I can't have it in my room myself. I'm dedicated that way.
author: Grace Hightower

quote: I am originally from Florida. So Thanksgiving was always something I really looked forward to, because I got to travel back home every year and see everyone all at once, around one big happy table.
author: Troy Gentile

quote: I'm such a girl for the living room. I really like to stay in my nest and not move. I travel in my mind, and that that's a rigorous state of journeying for me. My body isn't that interested in moving from place to place.
author: bell hooks

quote: The most important thing we can do is inspire young minds and to advance the kind of science, math and technology education that will help youngsters take us to the next phase of space travel.
author: John Glenn

quote: There are always things I find difficult - being in crowds, remembering faces. I do like routines. I always travel with someone. My life in Avignon is a very quiet one. I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
author: Daniel Tammet

I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
author: Daniel Tammet

quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: I think I usually have quite ordinary dreams. Sometimes my dreams take me to other dimensions. I can travel in my mind especially when I'm dreaming I focus my mind on what I want to dream. If I want to fly, I focus on flying.
author: Uri Geller

quote: Greater personal choice, individually tailored services, stronger local accountability, greater efficiency - these are all central to the new direction of travel we have set for our public services.
author: John Hutton

quote: I am not unconscious of the persuasive power exerted by these considerations to drag men along in the current; but I am not at liberty to travel that road.
author: Benjamin F. Wade

quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water.
author: Will Steger

quote: My Christmas present to myself each year is to see how much air travel can open up the world and take me to places as far from sheltered California and Japan as possible.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
author: Felix Baumgartner

quote: Mark Twain was a great traveler and he wrote three or four great travel books. I wouldn't say that I'm a travel novelist but rather a novelist who travels - and who uses travel as a background for finding stories of places.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: I actually bought a travel guitar, and that guitar is really cool. You can actually fold the guitar, and you can plug headphones into it, but it's acoustic, or semi-acoustic.
author: Daniel Ek

quote: The thing I love about being an actor is the ability to travel and experience new cultures.
author: Paul Wesley

quote: I grew up skateboarding; it was fun. I didn't think about money, I didn't know how much professional skateboarders made. I just knew that if I became a professional skateboarder, I would achieve a lot and get to travel and do these great things.
author: Jason Lee

quote: You can get too close as a team. You need time away from each other. You change in the same dressing room, you play on the same cricket field, you stay in the same hotel, you travel in the same planes and buses. C'mon - this business of everyone holding hands and being pally is nonsense.
author: Glenn Turner

quote: I don't especially like to travel, not the way many people do. I know many people that love to go to far-off and different places, and I've never been like that. I seem to get homesick as quickly as a child.
author: Elizabeth Strout

quote: I find it an absolute pleasure to read travel guides, especially the Michelin guides, and their description of places I know I'll probably never visit. I spend a large part of my life reading descriptions of restaurants.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: Point-to-point transit via low orbit could dramatically speed up international flights, connecting the world even further. And safe, consistent space travel opens up the possibility of commercial space stations, trips to the moon and exploration beyond.
author: Ben Parr

quote: Whether a plane to Singapore, a subway in Manhattan, or the streets of Cincinnati, I search for meaningful conversation wherever I may travel. Without it, I believe we lose the ability to not only understand others, but more importantly, ourselves.
author: Dhani Jones

quote: In a fit at the bookstore one day, I bought all my favourite composers' biographies: Schubert, Massenet, Wolf. I've still not had a chance to read them; it breaks my heart. But when you travel so much, you just can't take that many books with you.
author: Danielle de Niese

quote: I cannot always write at the same time, in the same place. I work, travel and have a vigorous family life. If I'm stranded in an airport lobby - I write. If I have to wait in a doctor's office - I write. If I have a morning or evening to myself - I write.
author: Carmen Agra Deedy

quote: Probably the first time I left Italy was to travel by train to Lourdes. I went with my mother and my grandmother - who was a very religious person - so it was a pilgrimage of sorts. I remember it as a very intense, but beautiful experience.
author: Andrea Bocelli

quote: People want to go out and travel around and meet cool people. I could just go live in Vermont, but is that what I really want?
author: Tom Brady

quote: Unfortunately, I'm more experienced than I care to admit on long-distance relationships. Just because that is my life. I travel because I love to. As a result, I have to sort of make it work when a relationship kind of comes into view.
author: Hunter Hayes

quote: I adore Madrid. It's my city. If I ever move, it will only be for work. Whenever I travel, I always want to get back home.
author: Maria Valverde

quote: If I were involved with the NBA, I wouldn't want a 19-year-old or a 20-year-old kid to bring into all the travel and all the problems that exist in the NBA. I would want a much more mature kid. I would want a kid that maybe I've been watching on another team, and now he's 21, 22 years old instead of 18 or 19, and I might trade for that kid.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: We take so many of our freedoms for granted nowadays - I can travel where I like, I can do any job I want - but I think chivalry has been lost a little bit.
author: Michelle Dockery

quote: Once I accidentally left my passport in Nice, France, when I was on my way to Prague. Upon arriving in Vienna, after taking an overnight, and being asked to present my travel documents and realizing I forgot them at the hotel, they kicked me off the train and sent me back!

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
author: John Muir

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on its vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to its security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Gymnastics demands so much of our time. We train all week and travel and compete on weekends. The people you're surrounded by really become your second family, your best friends, your sisters. My coach was like a second mother for me.
author: Amanda Borden

quote: Every day is intense and alive, whether it's travel, work, even down time, which there is so little of.
author: Josh Lucas

quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.
author: Damon Albarn

quote: What should I have known or written had I been a quiet, mercantile politician or a lord in waiting? A man must travel, and turmoil, or there is no existence.
author: Lord Byron

quote: My kids started school, so having a strong base in Melbourne has been a key priority. I'm not daunted by the travel. People say, 'It's so far to Australia,' and I say, 'You get on the plane, you eat well, you sleep, you wake up - and you're there.'
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: I hate to travel with stuff.
author: Manolo Blahnik

quote: I'm terrified of bugs and I travel with sprays, lotions, potions; the lot. I have to check the room before I go to sleep and if I come across a bug and fail to remove it I have to sleep in a separate room as I'm paranoid that I'll be taken advantage of as I sleep.
author: Freema Agyeman

quote: I've never done it, but I think if you do a Google search for 'People who will help me travel across the country to meet my online love,' I'm probably the only person that comes up.
author: Nev Schulman

quote: There are two books that I often travel with; one is 'The Theory on Moral Sentiments' by Adam Smith. The other is 'The Meditations.' It's not that I agree with either views expressed in the books, but I believe ideas and thoughts of older generations can offer food for thought for the current generation.
author: Wen Jiabao

quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there.
author: Fred Allen

quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
author: Al Gore

quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
author: Mary Ritter Beard

quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.
author: Philip Glass

quote: There's only one drummer. We all travel to his beat. Well, I couldn't sing his song. Because for me, it wasn't a truthful statement. Well, Linda sang it, and it was a monster for her.
author: Barry McGuire

quote: Although my book is banned I am still allowed to go to China and travel. There is no longer the kind of control that Mao used to have-there have been deep fundamental changes in society.
author: Jung Chang

quote: But my sense in talking to people when I travel is that the film business is not that dissimilar from a lot of other businesses.
author: Steven Soderbergh

quote: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: Each day as I travel through downtown Tucson, I am amazed at how quickly the most ancient of human behaviors have changed. For as long as there have been Homo sapiens - roughly 200,000 years - people have filled their lives principally with two activities: talking directly with other people, and doing physical things.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: Tell people you're a Canadian or a Kiwi when you travel and they'll adore you.
author: Daniel Gillies

quote: I actually think some of my best moments in life have been while I was with people from Instagram - whether it's super late nights getting a release out or being able to travel to places I'd never visited and meeting some of the most interesting people I've ever met.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: I travel so much and am always living out of a suitcase, so my favorite saying is 'Wherever you go, there you are'. I love it because it's reassuring to me that you have to live in the moment wherever you happen to be.
author: Jake Shears

quote: As a teenager, I used to travel everywhere with my guitar. I appreciated the fact it was with me, but it was always an absolute pain to carry around - even though, in those days, you could take in on a plane as hand luggage.
author: Greg Wise

quote: There are still many places I haven't seen that I'd like to travel to. I've never seen the Pyramids, and I'd love to explore the culture in North India. I think walking in the Andes would also be awesome.
author: Bjorn Ulvaeus

quote: Finney is about the best writer of time travel stories ever, and I adore time travel stories - have to make a time travel game someday!
author: Warren Spector

quote: I travel the garden of music, thru inspiration. It's a large, very large garden, seen?
author: Peter Tosh

quote: The Lord gave me 'Sojourner,' because I was to travel up an' down the land, showin' the people their sins an' bein' a sign unto them. Afterwards, I told the Lord I wanted another name 'cause everybody else had two names, and the Lord gave me 'Truth,' because I was to declare the truth to people.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another.
author: Roger Moore

quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
author: Mink Stole

quote: I have been able to travel all over the country and see many places that I probably never would have visited. I have also participated in many charity events for worthy causes.
author: Rob Mariano

quote: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: I'm a travel enthusiast.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: I think having toured the world and seeing many places, I've just been blown away by how we've really scarred our home. I'm as guilty as the next person if not more so. I travel a lot. The damage we do to our planet is huge.
author: James Blunt

quote: My pals, such as they are, in Hollywood, ask me why I love to travel to D.C. so much, why it's a vacation destination for me. I say, 'Because I sometimes have perfect days there.'
author: Ben Stein

quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education. In order to appreciate cultures of another nation, one needs to go there, know the people and mingle with the culture of that country. One way to do that, if one is lucky enough, is to buy things from those cultures.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: If I go anywhere, and I don't have my coffee, I don't drink coffee. When I travel, I carry it with me - and I ask hotels to grind it and brew it for me if I can't have it in my room myself. I'm dedicated that way.
author: Grace Hightower

quote: I am originally from Florida. So Thanksgiving was always something I really looked forward to, because I got to travel back home every year and see everyone all at once, around one big happy table.
author: Troy Gentile

quote: I'm such a girl for the living room. I really like to stay in my nest and not move. I travel in my mind, and that that's a rigorous state of journeying for me. My body isn't that interested in moving from place to place.
author: bell hooks

quote: The most important thing we can do is inspire young minds and to advance the kind of science, math and technology education that will help youngsters take us to the next phase of space travel.
author: John Glenn

quote: There are always things I find difficult - being in crowds, remembering faces. I do like routines. I always travel with someone. My life in Avignon is a very quiet one. I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
author: Daniel Tammet

quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: I think I usually have quite ordinary dreams. Sometimes my dreams take me to other dimensions. I can travel in my mind especially when I'm dreaming I focus my mind on what I want to dream. If I want to fly, I focus on flying.
author: Uri Geller

quote: Greater personal choice, individually tailored services, stronger local accountability, greater efficiency - these are all central to the new direction of travel we have set for our public services.
author: John Hutton

quote: I am not unconscious of the persuasive power exerted by these considerations to drag men along in the current; but I am not at liberty to travel that road.
author: Benjamin F. Wade

quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water.
author: Will Steger

quote: My Christmas present to myself each year is to see how much air travel can open up the world and take me to places as far from sheltered California and Japan as possible.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
author: Felix Baumgartner

quote: Mark Twain was a great traveler and he wrote three or four great travel books. I wouldn't say that I'm a travel novelist but rather a novelist who travels - and who uses travel as a background for finding stories of places.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: I actually bought a travel guitar, and that guitar is really cool. You can actually fold the guitar, and you can plug headphones into it, but it's acoustic, or semi-acoustic.
author: Daniel Ek

quote: The thing I love about being an actor is the ability to travel and experience new cultures.
author: Paul Wesley

quote: I grew up skateboarding; it was fun. I didn't think about money, I didn't know how much professional skateboarders made. I just knew that if I became a professional skateboarder, I would achieve a lot and get to travel and do these great things.
author: Jason Lee

quote: You can get too close as a team. You need time away from each other. You change in the same dressing room, you play on the same cricket field, you stay in the same hotel, you travel in the same planes and buses. C'mon - this business of everyone holding hands and being pally is nonsense.
author: Glenn Turner

quote: I don't especially like to travel, not the way many people do. I know many people that love to go to far-off and different places, and I've never been like that. I seem to get homesick as quickly as a child.
author: Elizabeth Strout

quote: I find it an absolute pleasure to read travel guides, especially the Michelin guides, and their description of places I know I'll probably never visit. I spend a large part of my life reading descriptions of restaurants.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: Point-to-point transit via low orbit could dramatically speed up international flights, connecting the world even further. And safe, consistent space travel opens up the possibility of commercial space stations, trips to the moon and exploration beyond.
author: Ben Parr

quote: Whether a plane to Singapore, a subway in Manhattan, or the streets of Cincinnati, I search for meaningful conversation wherever I may travel. Without it, I believe we lose the ability to not only understand others, but more importantly, ourselves.
author: Dhani Jones

quote: In a fit at the bookstore one day, I bought all my favourite composers' biographies: Schubert, Massenet, Wolf. I've still not had a chance to read them; it breaks my heart. But when you travel so much, you just can't take that many books with you.
author: Danielle de Niese

quote: I cannot always write at the same time, in the same place. I work, travel and have a vigorous family life. If I'm stranded in an airport lobby - I write. If I have to wait in a doctor's office - I write. If I have a morning or evening to myself - I write.
author: Carmen Agra Deedy

quote: Probably the first time I left Italy was to travel by train to Lourdes. I went with my mother and my grandmother - who was a very religious person - so it was a pilgrimage of sorts. I remember it as a very intense, but beautiful experience.
author: Andrea Bocelli

quote: People want to go out and travel around and meet cool people. I could just go live in Vermont, but is that what I really want?
author: Tom Brady

quote: Unfortunately, I'm more experienced than I care to admit on long-distance relationships. Just because that is my life. I travel because I love to. As a result, I have to sort of make it work when a relationship kind of comes into view.
author: Hunter Hayes

quote: I adore Madrid. It's my city. If I ever move, it will only be for work. Whenever I travel, I always want to get back home.
author: Maria Valverde

quote: If I were involved with the NBA, I wouldn't want a 19-year-old or a 20-year-old kid to bring into all the travel and all the problems that exist in the NBA. I would want a much more mature kid. I would want a kid that maybe I've been watching on another team, and now he's 21, 22 years old instead of 18 or 19, and I might trade for that kid.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: We take so many of our freedoms for granted nowadays - I can travel where I like, I can do any job I want - but I think chivalry has been lost a little bit.
author: Michelle Dockery

quote: Chicago is an October sort of city even in spring.
author: Nelson Algren

quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You define a good flight by negatives: you didn't get hijacked, you didn't crash, you didn't throw up, you weren't late, you weren't nauseated by the food. So you are grateful.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: I never make a trip to the United States without visiting a supermarket. To me they are more fascinating than any fashion salon.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy.
author: Fanny Burney

quote: I love short trips to New York; to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.
author: James Cameron

quote: Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones.
author: Sophie Swetchine

quote: Two great talkers will not travel far together.
author: George Borrow

quote: I've always enjoyed traveling and having experience with different cultures and different people. But it's also a wonderful thing to be able to benefit and enable research, not only in our country but around the world.
author: Laurel Clark

quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home.
author: David Attenborough

quote: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money.
author: Lewis Hallam

quote: There comes a moment on a journey when something sweet, something irresistible and charming as wine raised to thirsty lips, wells up in the traveller's being.
author: Patrick MacGill

quote: One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: In both business and personal life, I've always found that travel inspires me more than anything else I do. Evidence of the languages, cultures, scenery, food, and design sensibilities that I discover all over the world can be found in every piece of my jewelry.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: I favor pocket-sized hard drives that travel between home and office, syncing with computers on both ends.
author: Barton Gellman

quote: If you play the same club every week of every month, it's kind of boring. It's great that you can play one night in Brazil and one night in Japan, one night in Europe, and see the world. It's amazing what you see if you travel around the world.
author: Tiesto

quote: Since I travel so much, it's always great to be home. There's nothing like getting to raid my own refrigerator at two in the morning.
author: Amy Grant

quote: This evening I wish to suggest that we Christians should accompany people on their pilgrimages. Specifically we should travel with people as they search for the good, the true and the beautiful.
author: Timothy Radcliffe

quote: You know it's only 50 miles from Grand River to Canton, but it took me 67 years to travel that distance.
author: Don Shula

quote: This June, I'll travel once again to the Food and Wine Magazine Classic in Aspen, Colorado. For many years, my dear friend Julia Child and I have teamed up to teach classes together at the event; for the past seven years, my daughter, Claudine, has been my cooking partner on stage.
author: Jacques Pepin

quote: I've always been a big fan of time travel, and I'm very into the notion that some day we'll be able to do it. Beam me up!
author: Scott Bakula

quote: Air travel survived decades of terrorism, including attacks which resulted in the deaths of everyone on the plane. It survived 9/11. It'll survive the next successful attack. The only real worry is that we'll scare ourselves into making air travel so onerous that we won't fly anymore.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: Once I accidentally left my passport in Nice, France, when I was on my way to Prague. Upon arriving in Vienna, after taking an overnight, and being asked to present my travel documents and realizing I forgot them at the hotel, they kicked me off the train and sent me back!
author: Megalyn Echikunwoke

quote: Thursday night football is here to stay. So we're looking at ways to make it safer. Now they're playing division games, so you limit travel. Now the question is, should you play Sunday night before a Thursday night?
author: John Madden

quote: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
author: Donny Robinson

quote: Rome - the city of visible history, where the past of a whole hemisphere seems moving in funeral procession with strange ancestral images and trophies gathered from afar.
author: George Eliot

quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.
author: William Blake

quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.
author: Henry Adams

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
author: John Muir

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on its vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to its security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.

quote: I find it an absolute pleasure to read travel guides, especially the Michelin guides, and their description of places I know I'll probably never visit. I spend a large part of my life reading descriptions of restaurants.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: Point-to-point transit via low orbit could dramatically speed up international flights, connecting the world even further. And safe, consistent space travel opens up the possibility of commercial space stations, trips to the moon and exploration beyond.
author: Ben Parr

quote: Whether a plane to Singapore, a subway in Manhattan, or the streets of Cincinnati, I search for meaningful conversation wherever I may travel. Without it, I believe we lose the ability to not only understand others, but more importantly, ourselves.
author: Dhani Jones

quote: In a fit at the bookstore one day, I bought all my favourite composers' biographies: Schubert, Massenet, Wolf. I've still not had a chance to read them; it breaks my heart. But when you travel so much, you just can't take that many books with you.
author: Danielle de Niese

quote: I cannot always write at the same time, in the same place. I work, travel and have a vigorous family life. If I'm stranded in an airport lobby - I write. If I have to wait in a doctor's office - I write. If I have a morning or evening to myself - I write.
author: Carmen Agra Deedy

quote: Probably the first time I left Italy was to travel by train to Lourdes. I went with my mother and my grandmother - who was a very religious person - so it was a pilgrimage of sorts. I remember it as a very intense, but beautiful experience.
author: Andrea Bocelli

quote: People want to go out and travel around and meet cool people. I could just go live in Vermont, but is that what I really want?
author: Tom Brady

quote: Unfortunately, I'm more experienced than I care to admit on long-distance relationships. Just because that is my life. I travel because I love to. As a result, I have to sort of make it work when a relationship kind of comes into view.
author: Hunter Hayes

quote: I adore Madrid. It's my city. If I ever move, it will only be for work. Whenever I travel, I always want to get back home.
author: Maria Valverde

quote: If I were involved with the NBA, I wouldn't want a 19-year-old or a 20-year-old kid to bring into all the travel and all the problems that exist in the NBA. I would want a much more mature kid. I would want a kid that maybe I've been watching on another team, and now he's 21, 22 years old instead of 18 or 19, and I might trade for that kid.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: We take so many of our freedoms for granted nowadays - I can travel where I like, I can do any job I want - but I think chivalry has been lost a little bit.
author: Michelle Dockery

quote: Chicago is an October sort of city even in spring.
author: Nelson Algren

quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You define a good flight by negatives: you didn't get hijacked, you didn't crash, you didn't throw up, you weren't late, you weren't nauseated by the food. So you are grateful.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: I never make a trip to the United States without visiting a supermarket. To me they are more fascinating than any fashion salon.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy.
author: Fanny Burney

quote: I love short trips to New York; to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.
author: James Cameron

quote: Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones.
author: Sophie Swetchine

quote: Two great talkers will not travel far together.
author: George Borrow

quote: I've always enjoyed traveling and having experience with different cultures and different people. But it's also a wonderful thing to be able to benefit and enable research, not only in our country but around the world.
author: Laurel Clark

quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home.
author: David Attenborough

quote: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money.
author: Lewis Hallam

quote: There comes a moment on a journey when something sweet, something irresistible and charming as wine raised to thirsty lips, wells up in the traveller's being.
author: Patrick MacGill

quote: One travels to run away from routine, that dreadful routine that kills all imagination and all our capacity for enthusiasm.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: In both business and personal life, I've always found that travel inspires me more than anything else I do. Evidence of the languages, cultures, scenery, food, and design sensibilities that I discover all over the world can be found in every piece of my jewelry.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: I favor pocket-sized hard drives that travel between home and office, syncing with computers on both ends.
author: Barton Gellman

quote: If you play the same club every week of every month, it's kind of boring. It's great that you can play one night in Brazil and one night in Japan, one night in Europe, and see the world. It's amazing what you see if you travel around the world.
author: Tiesto

quote: Since I travel so much, it's always great to be home. There's nothing like getting to raid my own refrigerator at two in the morning.
author: Amy Grant

quote: This evening I wish to suggest that we Christians should accompany people on their pilgrimages. Specifically we should travel with people as they search for the good, the true and the beautiful.
author: Timothy Radcliffe

quote: You know it's only 50 miles from Grand River to Canton, but it took me 67 years to travel that distance.
author: Don Shula

quote: This June, I'll travel once again to the Food and Wine Magazine Classic in Aspen, Colorado. For many years, my dear friend Julia Child and I have teamed up to teach classes together at the event; for the past seven years, my daughter, Claudine, has been my cooking partner on stage.
author: Jacques Pepin

quote: I've always been a big fan of time travel, and I'm very into the notion that some day we'll be able to do it. Beam me up!
author: Scott Bakula

quote: Air travel survived decades of terrorism, including attacks which resulted in the deaths of everyone on the plane. It survived 9/11. It'll survive the next successful attack. The only real worry is that we'll scare ourselves into making air travel so onerous that we won't fly anymore.
author: Bruce Schneier

quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Success comes to those who dedicate everything to their passion in life. To be successful, it is also very important to be humble and never let fame or money travel to your head.
author: A. R. Rahman

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
author: Matsuo Basho

quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
author: Rosalia de Castro

quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
author: Danny Kaye

quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
author: George A. Moore

quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Life is short and the older you get, the more you feel it. Indeed, the shorter it is. People lose their capacity to walk, run, travel, think, and experience life. I realise how important it is to use the time I have.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
author: Frank Borman

quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
author: Buddha

quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: A journey is a person in itself; no two are alike. And all plans, safeguards, policing, and coercion are fruitless. We find that after years of struggle that we do not take a trip; a trip takes us.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
author: Martin Buber

quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Rome is the city of echoes, the city of illusions, and the city of yearning.
author: Giotto di Bondone

quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Once I accidentally left my passport in Nice, France, when I was on my way to Prague. Upon arriving in Vienna, after taking an overnight, and being asked to present my travel documents and realizing I forgot them at the hotel, they kicked me off the train and sent me back!
author: Megalyn Echikunwoke

quote: Thursday night football is here to stay. So we're looking at ways to make it safer. Now they're playing division games, so you limit travel. Now the question is, should you play Sunday night before a Thursday night?
author: John Madden

quote: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
author: Donny Robinson

quote: Rome - the city of visible history, where the past of a whole hemisphere seems moving in funeral procession with strange ancestral images and trophies gathered from afar.
author: George Eliot

quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.
author: William Blake

quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.
author: Henry Adams

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
author: John Muir

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on its vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to its security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Gymnastics demands so much of our time. We train all week and travel and compete on weekends. The people you're surrounded by really become your second family, your best friends, your sisters. My coach was like a second mother for me.
author: Amanda Borden

quote: Every day is intense and alive, whether it's travel, work, even down time, which there is so little of.
author: Josh Lucas

quote: Being in Blur has allowed me to travel and hear the music that's being made all over the world.
author: Damon Albarn

quote: What should I have known or written had I been a quiet, mercantile politician or a lord in waiting? A man must travel, and turmoil, or there is no existence.
author: Lord Byron

quote: My kids started school, so having a strong base in Melbourne has been a key priority. I'm not daunted by the travel. People say, 'It's so far to Australia,' and I say, 'You get on the plane, you eat well, you sleep, you wake up - and you're there.'
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: I hate to travel with stuff.
author: Manolo Blahnik

quote: I'm terrified of bugs and I travel with sprays, lotions, potions; the lot. I have to check the room before I go to sleep and if I come across a bug and fail to remove it I have to sleep in a separate room as I'm paranoid that I'll be taken advantage of as I sleep.
author: Freema Agyeman

quote: I've never done it, but I think if you do a Google search for 'People who will help me travel across the country to meet my online love,' I'm probably the only person that comes up.
author: Nev Schulman

quote: There are two books that I often travel with; one is 'The Theory on Moral Sentiments' by Adam Smith. The other is 'The Meditations.' It's not that I agree with either views expressed in the books, but I believe ideas and thoughts of older generations can offer food for thought for the current generation.
author: Wen Jiabao

quote: We've gotta reinvest in space travel. We should've never left the moon.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: When I travel, I feel more like a nomad than a tourist.
author: Mohsin Hamid

quote: I have just returned from Boston. It is the only thing to do if you find yourself up there.
author: Fred Allen

quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.
author: Al Gore

quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
author: Mary Ritter Beard

quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.
author: Philip Glass

quote: There's only one drummer. We all travel to his beat. Well, I couldn't sing his song. Because for me, it wasn't a truthful statement. Well, Linda sang it, and it was a monster for her.
author: Barry McGuire

quote: Although my book is banned I am still allowed to go to China and travel. There is no longer the kind of control that Mao used to have-there have been deep fundamental changes in society.
author: Jung Chang

quote: But my sense in talking to people when I travel is that the film business is not that dissimilar from a lot of other businesses.
author: Steven Soderbergh

quote: For years, I had no time for exploratory travel.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: Each day as I travel through downtown Tucson, I am amazed at how quickly the most ancient of human behaviors have changed. For as long as there have been Homo sapiens - roughly 200,000 years - people have filled their lives principally with two activities: talking directly with other people, and doing physical things.
author: Andrew Weil

quote: Tell people you're a Canadian or a Kiwi when you travel and they'll adore you.
author: Daniel Gillies

quote: I actually think some of my best moments in life have been while I was with people from Instagram - whether it's super late nights getting a release out or being able to travel to places I'd never visited and meeting some of the most interesting people I've ever met.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: I travel so much and am always living out of a suitcase, so my favorite saying is 'Wherever you go, there you are'. I love it because it's reassuring to me that you have to live in the moment wherever you happen to be.
author: Jake Shears

quote: As a teenager, I used to travel everywhere with my guitar. I appreciated the fact it was with me, but it was always an absolute pain to carry around - even though, in those days, you could take in on a plane as hand luggage.
author: Greg Wise

quote: There are still many places I haven't seen that I'd like to travel to. I've never seen the Pyramids, and I'd love to explore the culture in North India. I think walking in the Andes would also be awesome.
author: Bjorn Ulvaeus

quote: Finney is about the best writer of time travel stories ever, and I adore time travel stories - have to make a time travel game someday!
author: Warren Spector

quote: I travel the garden of music, thru inspiration. It's a large, very large garden, seen?
author: Peter Tosh

quote: The Lord gave me 'Sojourner,' because I was to travel up an' down the land, showin' the people their sins an' bein' a sign unto them. Afterwards, I told the Lord I wanted another name 'cause everybody else had two names, and the Lord gave me 'Truth,' because I was to declare the truth to people.
author: Sojourner Truth

quote: It's wonderful to travel with somebody that you love and we never travel anywhere without one another.
author: Roger Moore

quote: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
author: Mink Stole

quote: I have been able to travel all over the country and see many places that I probably never would have visited. I have also participated in many charity events for worthy causes.
author: Rob Mariano

quote: You do not travel if you are afraid of the unknown, you travel for the unknown, that reveals you with yourself.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: I'm a travel enthusiast.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: I think having toured the world and seeing many places, I've just been blown away by how we've really scarred our home. I'm as guilty as the next person if not more so. I travel a lot. The damage we do to our planet is huge.
author: James Blunt

quote: My pals, such as they are, in Hollywood, ask me why I love to travel to D.C. so much, why it's a vacation destination for me. I say, 'Because I sometimes have perfect days there.'
author: Ben Stein

quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education. In order to appreciate cultures of another nation, one needs to go there, know the people and mingle with the culture of that country. One way to do that, if one is lucky enough, is to buy things from those cultures.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: If I go anywhere, and I don't have my coffee, I don't drink coffee. When I travel, I carry it with me - and I ask hotels to grind it and brew it for me if I can't have it in my room myself. I'm dedicated that way.
author: Grace Hightower

quote: I am originally from Florida. So Thanksgiving was always something I really looked forward to, because I got to travel back home every year and see everyone all at once, around one big happy table.
author: Troy Gentile

quote: I'm such a girl for the living room. I really like to stay in my nest and not move. I travel in my mind, and that that's a rigorous state of journeying for me. My body isn't that interested in moving from place to place.
author: bell hooks

quote: The most important thing we can do is inspire young minds and to advance the kind of science, math and technology education that will help youngsters take us to the next phase of space travel.
author: John Glenn

quote: There are always things I find difficult - being in crowds, remembering faces. I do like routines. I always travel with someone. My life in Avignon is a very quiet one. I have an apartment that looks over the whole city. I can drop into town, but a lot of the time I write from home. In some respects I still live a very quiet, simple life.
author: Daniel Tammet

quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: I think I usually have quite ordinary dreams. Sometimes my dreams take me to other dimensions. I can travel in my mind especially when I'm dreaming I focus my mind on what I want to dream. If I want to fly, I focus on flying.
author: Uri Geller

quote: Greater personal choice, individually tailored services, stronger local accountability, greater efficiency - these are all central to the new direction of travel we have set for our public services.
author: John Hutton

quote: I am not unconscious of the persuasive power exerted by these considerations to drag men along in the current; but I am not at liberty to travel that road.
author: Benjamin F. Wade

quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: Within 10 years it will be impossible to travel to the North Pole by dog team. There will be too much open water.
author: Will Steger

quote: My Christmas present to myself each year is to see how much air travel can open up the world and take me to places as far from sheltered California and Japan as possible.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Aviation - and space travel, in particular - have always been especially captivating.
author: Felix Baumgartner

quote: Mark Twain was a great traveler and he wrote three or four great travel books. I wouldn't say that I'm a travel novelist but rather a novelist who travels - and who uses travel as a background for finding stories of places.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: I actually bought a travel guitar, and that guitar is really cool. You can actually fold the guitar, and you can plug headphones into it, but it's acoustic, or semi-acoustic.
author: Daniel Ek

quote: The thing I love about being an actor is the ability to travel and experience new cultures.
author: Paul Wesley

quote: I grew up skateboarding; it was fun. I didn't think about money, I didn't know how much professional skateboarders made. I just knew that if I became a professional skateboarder, I would achieve a lot and get to travel and do these great things.
author: Jason Lee

quote: You can get too close as a team. You need time away from each other. You change in the same dressing room, you play on the same cricket field, you stay in the same hotel, you travel in the same planes and buses. C'mon - this business of everyone holding hands and being pally is nonsense.
author: Glenn Turner

quote: I don't especially like to travel, not the way many people do. I know many people that love to go to far-off and different places, and I've never been like that. I seem to get homesick as quickly as a child.
author: Elizabeth Strout

quote: I find it an absolute pleasure to read travel guides, especially the Michelin guides, and their description of places I know I'll probably never visit. I spend a large part of my life reading descriptions of restaurants.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: Point-to-point transit via low orbit could dramatically speed up international flights, connecting the world even further. And safe, consistent space travel opens up the possibility of commercial space stations, trips to the moon and exploration beyond.
